&ltTBL>.IS_DELETED() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.IS_DELETED() Description The &ltTBL>.IS_DELETED() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the current record has been deleted. Example This script deletes the current record, then checks to see if its status is "Deleted". dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() tbl.change_begin() tbl.delete() tbl.change_end(.T.) status = tbl.is_deleted()
